schema_note: Schema v0.3 (Platinum Sprint 2026-02-11). Added fields: implementation_status (PRODUCTION|PROTOTYPE|SKELETON|DESIGN_ONLY), ci_workflow (ci-python.yml|ci-typescript.yml|ci-mixed.yml|ci-minimal.yml|null), platinum_status (boolean). Phase 0 schema (v0.2), hardened 2026-02-10. Four fields populated for all repos: dependencies (array of org/repo strings), promotion_status (LOCAL|CANDIDATE|PUBLIC_PROCESS|GRADUATED|ARCHIVED), tier (flagship|standard|stub|archive|infrastructure), last_validated (ISO 8601).
launch_date_note: Phase -1 complete 2026-02-10. Bronze Sprint COMPLETE 2026-02-10. Silver Sprint COMPLETE 2026-02-10. Gold Sprint COMPLETE 2026-02-10. PHASE 2 MICRO-VALIDATION COMPLETE 2026-02-10. PHASE 3 COMPLETE 2026-02-11. SYSTEM LAUNCHED 2026-02-11. 9/9 launch criteria met. POSSE verified: Mastodon (HTTP 200) + Discord (HTTP 204). Jekyll site live with RSS (5 essays). All validation scripts pass.
source: Audit of 8 GitHub orgs (organvm-i-theoria through organvm-vii-kerygma + meta-organvm) + personal account 4444J99 + local repos
project_status: AUTONOMY SPRINT 2026-02-13. seed.yaml automation contracts deployed to 82/88 repos (75 new + 5 pre-existing + 1 PR pending + 6 archived/skipped). 3 new agents: promotion-recommender.yml, orchestrator-agent.yml, enhanced validate-dependencies.yml. 9 total workflows in orchestration-start-here. Previous: GENESIS SPRINT 2026-02-12. Implementation: 74 PRODUCTION, 1 PROTOTYPE, 2 SKELETON, 11 DESIGN_ONLY. 88 registry entries, all on GitHub. ~363K total words. 21 essays (~88K words). Org counts: I=19, II=26, III=24, IV=7, V=2, VI=4, VII=4, Meta=2.

summary.total_repos_note: 88 registry entries, all on GitHub. GENESIS Sprint 2026-02-12: 7 new repos from local materials (card-trade-social, hokage-chess, life-betterment-simulation, universal-waveform-explorer, scalable-lore-expert, shared-remembrance-gateway, adaptive-personal-syllabus), 8 .github repos promoted DESIGN_ONLY→PRODUCTION. Previous sprints: IGNITION, PROPULSION, ASCENSION, EXODUS, PERFECTION. 4 explicitly archived.
summary.completion_at_launch: Platinum Sprint COMPLETE 2026-02-11 — 65 repos with CI workflows, standardized badge rows, CHANGELOGs, ADRs. 17 meta-system essays (~70K words). ~339K total words.
summary.portfolio_strength: GENESIS COMPLETE — 88 repos (all on GitHub), 74 PRODUCTION (84.1%) + 1 PROTOTYPE + 2 SKELETON + 11 DESIGN_ONLY, 7 flagship repos, 21 essays (~88K words), community health files across 8 orgs, POSSE distribution live, Jekyll site with RSS (21 essays), 77+ CI/CD workflows, portfolio site shows 20 projects across all 8 organs, meta-README 3,000+ words, ~363K total words.

meta_system_portfolio_note.context: Meta-system documentation (governance, orchestration, infrastructure) strengthens applications across: (1) AI systems engineering roles at research labs, (2) Creative/technical grants (NSF, NEA, Mellon, Knight Foundation), (3) Technology residencies and fellowships. This registry demonstrates orchestration capacity, architectural reasoning, and systemic sustainability—competitive differentiators in 2026 funding landscape.
meta_system_portfolio_note.supporting_evidence: Artists like Julian Oliver, Nicky Case, and Hundred Rabbits (Devine Lu Linvega & Rekka Bellum) treat protocols and governance structures as primary artistic output, demonstrating that small-scale sustainable creative infrastructure with extensive documentation receives institutional recognition (updated per 08-CANONICAL-ACTION-PLAN.md §7). Programs like Knight Foundation Art+Tech Expansion Fund, Processing Foundation Fellowship, Google Creative Fellowship explicitly evaluate infrastructure contribution and organizational capacity.
meta_system_portfolio_note.strategic_opportunity: Position the eight-organ system as evidence of: (a) production-ready thinking (hiring), (b) long-term digital capacity and sustainability (grants), (c) community contribution and reusable infrastructure (residencies). All organs launch simultaneously to demonstrate integrated systems thinking.

local_repos_migration.status: 14 local repos to be migrated to GitHub orgs at launch
local_repos_migration.strategy: Parallel migration with comprehensive README documentation

parallel_launch_implications.advantage_1: Meta-system visible immediately in applications (grants, hiring, residencies)
parallel_launch_implications.advantage_2: All cross-organ workflows active from day 1 - true systems integration
parallel_launch_implications.advantage_3: ORGAN-V can document entire 8-organ launch as primary narrative
parallel_launch_implications.advantage_4: Demonstrates orchestration capacity at full scale - key differentiator
parallel_launch_implications.challenge_1: Higher initial documentation burden (all READMEs simultaneously)
parallel_launch_implications.challenge_2: Simultaneous validation across 8 organs required before public launch
parallel_launch_implications.challenge_3: Any single broken dependency impacts entire system visibility
parallel_launch_implications.mitigation: Use comprehensive README audit (Phase 1) and per-organ micro-validation (Phase 2) before cross-organ workflows activate

documentation_audit_status.ORGAN-I: LOCKED — 17/17 repos documented + community health files. 0 broken links (7 fixed), 0 TBD markers.
documentation_audit_status.ORGAN-II: LOCKED — 20/20 active repos documented + 4 archived + 1 deleted + community health files. Gap-Fill Sprint: 6 new repos created, 5 stubs promoted to standard.
documentation_audit_status.ORGAN-III: LOCKED — 20/20 repos documented + community health files. 0 broken links, 0 TBD markers.
documentation_audit_status.ORGAN-IV: LOCKED — 6/6 repos documented + orchestration-start-here + community health files. 0 broken links.
documentation_audit_status.ORGAN-V: LOCKED — 1 repo + 5 meta-system essays (21.6K words) + community health files. 0 broken links.
documentation_audit_status.ORGAN-VI: LOCKED — 2/2 repos documented at 2,000+ words + org profile (772w) + community health files. Gap-Fill Sprint: 2 repos created and documented.
documentation_audit_status.ORGAN-VII: LOCKED — 3/3 repos documented at 2,000+ words + org profile (736w) + community health files. Gap-Fill Sprint: 3 repos created and documented.
documentation_audit_status.TOTAL_DOCUMENTATION_EFFORT: Gap-Fill Sprint validated: ~270K words across 72 documented repos + 8 org profiles + 5 essays + orchestration hub flagship (4,496w)
documentation_audit_status.PHASE_2_VALIDATION: COMPLETE 2026-02-10. V1: 7 broken links fixed (6 ORGAN-I READMEs patched). V2: 0 real TBD markers (12 false positives). V3: 67/67 repos reconciled. V4: 0 dependency violations. V5: All constitution gates PASS. V6: All 8 organs verified.

portfolio_positioning.hiring_angle: Lead with ORGAN-IV documentation to demonstrate: production-ready thinking, systems architecture, orchestration capacity, cross-functional complexity management. Use specific decisions in orchestration-system.md and github-actions-spec.md to show trade-off reasoning.
portfolio_positioning.grant_angle: Position ORGAN-V (Public Process essays) as primary narrative. Lead with Knight Foundation/Mellon framework: demonstrate long-term digital capacity, organizational sustainability, and systemic thinking. Use ORGAN-IV as evidence of infrastructure that enables ongoing work.
portfolio_positioning.residency_angle: Emphasize ORGAN-VI (Community) and cross-organ contribution infrastructure. Position as 'artist-engineer' profile with demonstrated capacity for ecosystem building. Use all 8 organs as evidence of systemic artistic practice.
portfolio_positioning.core_differentiator: Meta-system documentation itself (registry.json + orchestration-system.md + github-actions-spec.md + public-process essays) is the primary portfolio asset. Not just individual repos, but the governance layer coordinating them.

phase_1_documentation: About sections for all GitHub orgs (~105K TE)
phase_2_micro_validation: ORGAN-I: All 10 repos locked and documented (~850K TE)
ORGAN-II: All 13 repos with portfolios + case studies (~1,110K TE)
ORGAN-III: All 12 repos with governance + metrics (~1.1M TE)
ORGAN-IV: Orchestration system fully specified (~210K TE)
ORGAN-VI: Community repos indexed and accessible (~120K TE)
phase_3_integration: Public launch and ORGAN-V narrative publication (~135K TE)
launch_checklist.total_effort: ~6.5M TE across 4 sprints (Bronze Sprint first: 1.1M-1.6M TE band)
launch_checklist.timeline: Criteria-driven per 08-canonical-action-plan.md D-08. No fixed launch date.
